text: Joseph Girard may refer to: *Joseph Girard (Canadian politician) (1853–1933), Canadian politician *Joseph Girard (Swiss politician) (1815–1890), Swiss politician *Joseph Girard (historian) (1881–1962), French historian, librarian and museum curator *Joseph W. Girard (1871–1949), American actor *Joseph Girard III (born 2000) American basketball player
title: Joseph Girard
